				 resistors/width=2, resistors/zigs=6}]
			\draw [help lines] (0,0) grid (5,5);

			\draw (3,0) -- (5,0) to [short, -*]	(5,0.5); 
			\draw (5,2) to [short, -*]	(5,1.5);
			\draw (5,2) to (rP.wiper);
			\node at (5.25, 1) {$E_0$};
			\node at (3.25, 1) {$R$};

		\end{circuitikz}

\begin{circuitikz}[
	longpot/.style = {pR, resistors/scale=0.8,
		resistors/width=2, resistors/zigs=6}]
	\draw [help lines] (0,0) grid (10,5);			
	\draw (0,0) to[battery, l^=$E_i$] (0,4) to[short, i=$I$] (3,4) -- (3,4) to [longpot, l_=$R_P$, name=rP, i_=$I-I_S$] (3,0) -- (0,0); % Circuito 	
	\draw (rP.wiper) to [short, i=$I_S$] (10,2);
	\draw (10,2) to [short, -*]	(10,1.5);
	\draw (3,0) to [short] (10,0);
	\draw (10,0) to [short, -*]	(10,0.5);
	\draw (8,0) to [american resistor, l_=$R_S$] 	(8,2);
	\node at (10.25, 1) {$E_0$};
	
	\draw [<->] (3.5,1) -- (3.5,2)  node [pos = 0.5, right] {$R$};
	\draw [<->] (3.5,2) -- (3.5,3)  node [pos = 0.5, right] {$R_P-R$};
	
	\draw [very thick ,dashed](7.5, 2.5) --
	(7.5, -0.5) --(10.5, -0.5) -- (10.5, 2.5) -- (7.5, 2.5);
	\node[ rounded corners ,draw] at (10 ,4)
	 {\small{Strumento terminale }};
	 \draw[-stealth ](10,3.75) --(9,2.5);
\end{circuitikz}
